example.title: KullanÄ±m Ã–rnekleri
example.python_anthropic:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic(
    # Ã–nerilen: 127.0.0.1
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

# Not: Antigravity, Anthropic SDK ile herhangi bir modeli Ã§aÄŸÄ±rmayÄ± destekler
response = client.messages.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    max_tokens=1024,
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Merhaba"}]
)

print(response.content[0].text)
example.python_gemini:
# Kurulum: pip install google-generativeai
import google.generativeai as genai

# Antigravity proxy adresini kullan (Ã¶nerilen 127.0.0.1)
genai.configure(
    api_key="{{apiKey}}",
    transport='rest',
    client_options={'api_endpoint': '{{rawBaseUrl}}'}
)

model = genai.GenerativeModel('{{modelId}}')
response = model.generate_content("Merhaba")
print(response.text)
example.python_openai_image:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    # SeÃ§enek 1: boyut kullan (Ã¶nerilen)
    # Desteklenen: "1024x1024" (1:1), "1280x720" (16:9), "720x1280" (9:16), "1216x896" (4:3)
    extra_body={ "size": "1024x1024" },

    # SeÃ§enek 2: model eki kullan
    # Ã¶rn. gemini-3-pro-image-16-9, gemini-3-pro-image-4-3
    # model="gemini-3-pro-image-16-9",
    messages=[{
        "role": "user",
        "content": "FÃ¼tÃ¼ristik bir ÅŸehir Ã§iz"
    }]
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)
example.python_openai:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Merhaba"}]
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)
